name: Primus Fuel Bottle
description: A lightweight bottle to transport liquid fuels. A child-safe cap is included, and the standard connecting threads works with Primus OmniLite Ti, OmniFuel, MultiFuel, VariFuel, Gravity VF and MF and EtaPower MF stoves.Made of seamless extruded aluminium, with a lacquered inner.Childproof cap.Capacity is 1L with a useable volume of 850ml.
